text: (murrukaiyittirunta etirikalin ranuvankal murrukaiyai etuttuk kontucenru vittapotilum) anta ranuvam (innum) pokavillai enre ivarkal ennik kontirukkinranar. Anta ranuvankal tirumpa vantuvittalo oru kiramattirkuc cenru (oti olintu) maraivayiruntu kontu (ninkal verri perukirirkalo tolviyurukirirkalo enra) unkalaip parriya ceytiyai vicarittuk kontirupparkal. (Avvaru cellatu) avarkal unkalutan tanki iruntalum, oru corpa nerame tavira (atika neram) por puriya mattarkal
